    public class ButtonWidget
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Button
    This is a variant of Button with custom settings (using CssStyles.BUTTON). For security the string constructor treats the input as text instead of HTML.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)
